comment: Day one of a new decade and I'm beginning it by muting more keywords and turning off RTs from a significant number of people . I'm taking control of my feed the best I can , allowing myself a space to be curious and learn but on my terms .
amr:
# ::snt Day one of a new decade and I'm beginning it by muting more keywords and turning off RTs from a significant number of people . I'm taking control of my feed the best I can , allowing myself a space to be curious and learn but on my terms .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (d / day
                  :ord (o / ordinal-entity
                        :value 1)
                  :part-of (d2 / decade
                        :ARG1-of (n / new-01)))
            :op2 (b / begin-01
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (ii2 / it)
                  :manner (a2 / and
                        :op1 (m2 / mutter-01
                              :ARG0 ii
                              :ARG1 (k / keyword
                                    :quant (m3 / more)))
                        :op2 (t / turn-off-07
                              :ARG0 ii
                              :ARG1 (p / publication
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "RT")
                                    :source (p2 / person
                                          :quant (n3 / number
                                                :ARG1-of (s / significant-02))))))))
      :snt2 (t2 / take-01
            :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
            :ARG1 (c / control-01
                  :ARG0 ii3
                  :ARG1 (f / feed
                        :poss ii3)
                  :manner (g / good-03
                        :ARG2-of (h / have-degree-91
                              :ARG1 c
                              :ARG3 (m4 / most))))
            :manner (a3 / allow-01
                  :ARG0 ii3
                  :ARG1 (s2 / space
                        :purpose (a4 / and
                              :op1 (c2 / curious-01
                                    :ARG1 ii3)
                              :op2 (l / learn-01
                                    :ARG0 ii3))
                        :manner (t3 / term
                              :poss ii3)))))

comment: Social media is a space in which our attention is the real currency . Choose carefully how you want to spend that currency .
amr:
# ::snt Social media is a space in which our attention is the real currency . Choose carefully how you want to spend that currency .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / space
            :domain (m2 / media
                  :mod (s2 / social))
            :location-of (c / currency
                  :ARG1-of (r / real-04)
                  :domain (a / attend-02
                        :ARG0 (w / we))))
      :snt2 (c2 / choose-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (t / thing
                  :manner-of (w2 / want-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 (s3 / spend-01
                              :ARG0 y
                              :ARG3 (c3 / currency
                                    :mod (t2 / that)))))
            :manner (c4 / careful)))
